New Records: The Philadelphia Phillies set a season high for runs and hits with 22 in the game
Key Match Events: The game saw early scoring with seven runs in the first two innings
Pre-Game Insights: Phillies manager Rob Thomson emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance
Trea Turner noted the team's relentless effort and competitiveness
Post-Match Reflections: Marlins manager Skip Schumaker acknowledged the tough spot for the bullpen
Phillies placed Alec Bohm on the 10-day IL and promoted Buddy Kennedy
Miscellaneous Highlights: Miami promoted Griffin Conine from Triple-A and he started in right-field
Edward Cabrera was a late scratch due to migraine-like symptoms
